SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing CrimsonCast relative to AetherNet Sports?
SRP.A: CrimsonCast is {below} AetherNet Sports in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AetherNet Sports relative to CrimsonCast?
SRP.A: AetherNet Sports is {above} CrimsonCast in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total streaming views?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {AetherNet Sports}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total streaming views?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {CrimsonCast}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AetherNet Sports's minimum Streaming Views in the streamgraph?

NC.Q: Was the total Streaming Views in 1997 higher or lower than in 2007?
NC.A: The total streaming views in 1997 was {higher} than in 2007.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2006, was the average total Streaming Views higher or lower than between 2000 and 2007?
NC.A: The average total streaming views between 2002 and 2006 was {lower} than between 2000 and 2007.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2000, did the total Streaming Views experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total streaming views between 1999 and 2000 was {larger} than between 1998 and 2001.

NC.Q: Was the total Streaming Views in 2004 higher or lower than in 2007?
NC.A: The total streaming views in 2004 was {lower} than in 2007.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {AetherNet Sports} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did AetherNet Sports and CrimsonCast first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: AetherNet Sports and CrimsonCast first exchanged leading positions in {2000}.
